name: supseven/theme-base
description: Sitepackage Library of supseven. A swiss army knife for TYPO3 projects

suggest.b13/bolt: For autoloading site integrations via packages
suggest.eliashaeussler/typo3-warming: For HTTP cache warming and testing if all HTTP URLs work
suggest.josefglatz/hide-sys-template: To disable sys_template record editing in the BE
suggest.josefglatz/beuser-fastswitch: For quickly switching to other BE users
suggest.josefglatz/cropvariantsbuilder: For easy configuration of crops of image fields
suggest.lolli/dbdoctor: For extended DB checks and maintenance
suggest.plan2net/webp: For webp support in TYPO3 v12 and earlier
suggest.supseven/supi: For integration of user consent of third party elements in the frontend
suggest.christophlehmann/pagetreefilter: For an extended BE page tree search
suggest.spooner/deployer-information: To show the date of the last deployment in the BE
suggest.o-ba/custom_dashboard_widgets: For additional widgets for the BE dashboard
suggest.typo3/cms-linkvalidator: To check the availability of links on TYPO3 pages
suggest.typo3/cms-adminpanel: Show a panel of infos and actions in the frontend for editors
